info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 8 at 8:51PM CDT until June 8 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo TX
info.description:
At 849 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Big Country Baptist Assembly, or 8 miles east of Lueders, moving southeast at 50 mph.
THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR THE CITY OF STAMFORD.
HAZARD...90 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged or destroyed. Homes and businesses will have substantial roof and window damage. Expect extensive tree damage and power outages.
This severe storm will be near... Albany around 855 PM CDT. Moran around 910 PM CDT.
Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Funston, Mccarty Lake, Tuxedo, Big Country Baptist Assembly, Us- 380 Near The Haskell-Stonewall County Line, Us- 180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line, and The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600.
info.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
This storm is producing destructive winds and large damaging hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

parameter.value: A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HASKELL...NORTHERN JONES AND SHACKELFORD COUNTIES
NWS:DESTRUCTIVE WIND STORM in this area til 945 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING in effect for this area until 9:45 PM CDT for DESTRUCTIVE 90 mph winds. Take shelter in a sturdy building, away from windows. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter.

area.areaDesc: Haskell, TX; Jones, TX; Shackelford, TX

parameter.value: A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HASKELL...NORTHERN JONES AND SHACKELFORD COUNTIES
SNM:TORMENTA DE VIENTO DESTRUCTIVA en esta area hasta 945 PM CDT. Tome refugio ahora

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORMENTA SEVERA en efecto para esta area hasta las 9:45 PM CDT por vientos DESTRUCTIVOS de 90 mph. Tome refugio en un edificio, alejado de las ventanas. Escombros arrastrados por el viento podrian ser mortales para aquellos que se encuentran sin refugio.

area.areaDesc: Haskell, TX; Jones, TX; Shackelford, TX
